cpc_loadbalancer_discover_body: The OVH Load Balancer is compatible with Public Cloud, Private Cloud, VPS and Dedicated Servers, and balances the load between your various services in our datacentres. It scales your infrastructure to bear high levels of traffic, have higher fault tolerance and optimal response times, with a level of service that aims to have zero downtime. For simpler management, the OVH Load Balancer is also compatible with the OVH API and OpenStack (in the Warsaw, Frankfurt and London regions).
cpc_loadbalancer_key_explain_2:
Basic mode is not available for this Load Balancer as it has advanced configuration.
Please go to the advanced configuration page to add servers to your Load Balancer.
cpc_loadbalancer_configure_updated_messa: Your Load Balancer configuration has been successfully updated.
cpc_loadbalancer_configure_servers_condi: You must select at least 1 server to activate the Load Balancer.
cpc_loadbalancer_configure_openstack_exp:
You can configure your Load Balancer directly with the OpenStack API.
To do this, you must create an OpenStack user by following this guide on configuring user access to the Horizon interface.
After you have validated this option, you will be redirected to a new authentication page for authorising the OpenStack application to use the OVH API.
cpc_loadbalancer_configure_openstack_act: Authorise my OpenStack users to modify this Load Balancer.
